Andrew Chalk.title: DRIFTING
Andrew Chalk.about:
‘Drifting’ is the very first collaboration between Andrew Chalk and Daisuke Suzuki, which has 

remained unsurfaced since then-their private recording in 1996. In early 1996 Daisuke sent Andrew 

a DAT tape which included some unedited pieces that he recorded with found objects in his garden. 

Those fragments of recordings inspired Andrew to make a spontaneous recording and he made a 

live mix directly to cassette recorder with his instinct and archaic vision. ‘Drifting’ is a kind of 

archaic low-fi recording, but it has great atmosphere and perfect unison in texture.

‘Drifting’ was also a prelude to their long-term collaborations and the beginning of the change of 

direction in Andrew’s approach to music.

Remastered by Denis Blackham in 2023, and CD comes with glossy card sleeve in edition 300
Andrew Chalk.credits:
released June 14, 2023
            
            Mastered by Denis Blackham
